name: Wireframe Kit
description:
Speed up your workflow with this wireframe kit. If you're at an early stage of your project and trying to map out a quick rough idea of what goes where without getting into the nitty-gritty polished details‚Äîthis kit is for you. Complete with components for commonly used items, UI controls, and browser windows, in addition to easy to update styles.


This is the same kit that was featured by Figma back in March 2019 - https://www.figma.com/resources/assets/wireframe-kit/


Donations

If you are feeling generous and would like to donate to me for providing this resource, head on over here (and thank you for any contribution!):

https://gum.co/figmawireframekit


Updates

05/2021
